about_the_game: Meet Dafne Bennet! Ever since she was a child, Dafne was fascinated with strange worlds, which she traveled to by watching infolias and old holomovies. She wanted to satisfy her curiosity and hunger for adventure by joining the Out-Rangers, but her application was denied. Now, she travels to strange worlds by lying down on a couch and realizes her childhood dream as a gamedec.
detailed_description: Meet Dafne Bennet! Ever since she was a child, Dafne was fascinated with strange worlds, which she traveled to by watching infolias and old holomovies. She wanted to satisfy her curiosity and hunger for adventure by joining the Out-Rangers, but her application was denied. Now, she travels to strange worlds by lying down on a couch and realizes her childhood dream as a gamedec.
name: Gamedec: Dafne - Sensory Worlds' Citizen

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: New playable skin of Dafne Bennet - Retro Steam Cyber Woman is taking over the cases in Virtual Worlds.
supported_languages: English, Polish, German, Simplified Chinese, Russian, French, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese
